solution.text:
Volume is to be increased by \(_{{m*10000}}_\,litres\).
\(=_{{m*10}}_\,m^3\)
Cost of digging \(=\)Rs.\(_{{n*10}}_\) per cu.m.
Cost of increasing the capacity\(=\) Volume to be increased \(\times\) Rate of digging
\(=_{{m*10}}_ \times _{{n*10}}_\)
\(=\)Rs.\(_{{m*10*n*10}}_\)

content.text: What will be the cost of increasing the capacity of the reservoir, if cost of digging is Rs.\(_{{n*10}}_\) per cu.m.?
